channel.title: Changing wepon slot...? PROJECT INSANITY
channel.description:
ok well i just added a Vesta's Longsword to my server, and now every time i wield it, it wears it as a Helmet. how can i put it back to wepon slot?
i tried using the EquipmentEdditor, so i put down the number 13899(vls item id) and cliked "change" "load" "save". exited, compiled, and nothing happened. any clue?

item.title: Changing wepon slot...? PROJECT INSANITY
item.dc:creator: @beast_k0 beast k0
item.description:
@beast_k0 wrote:

i never added anything into item.java. so how would it be there?

Read full topic

item.title: Changing wepon slot...? PROJECT INSANITY
item.dc:creator: @H_tler H¡tler
item.description:
@H_tler wrote:

Open item.java and search for the ID, remove it completely from item.java.

Read full topic
